frontmatter.title: FieldBlock
frontmatter.description: `FieldBlock` is a reusable wrapper for building Field-components. It shows surrounding elements through properties from `FieldProps` like `label` and `error`, and ensure that spacing between different fields work as required when put into surrounding components like `Flex.Container` or `Card`. It can also be used to group multiple inner FieldBlock component, composing error messages together as one component.
